segments.text: Hi , David ! What are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , just looking at these club notices . I'm thinking of joining one . Hey-why don't we join a club together ? How about the Tennis Club ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I'm not good at tennis at all ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Neither am I . It's just that the best-looking girls are in that club .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , come on . That's no reason to do something you're not interested in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well ... What are you interested in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about the Classical Music Club ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds OK to me . I like movies . Hey , Joanna , look - there are a lot of decent-looking guys here . And the club jackets - they're really hot ! I think we made the right choice !
segments.speaker: S2
